product_name: Burton Scribe Smalls Snowboard Bindings - Girls' - 2014/2015
long_description: Patterned on the same platform the pros ride, the girls' Scribe Smalls snowboard bindings offer all-terrain performance, progression and durability for extended comfort while she learns how to shred.
short_description: Patterned on the same platform the pros ride, the girls' Scribe Smalls snowboard bindings offer all-terrain performance, progression and durability for extended comfort while she learns how to shred.
